info.author: Fernando
info.name: mta-mod-downloader
info.description: mod downloader system with graphical user interface

setting.name: *show_download_dialog
setting.friendlyname: Show Downloading Dialog

setting.name: *max_failed_downloads
setting.friendlyname: Max Allowed Failed Downloads
setting.desc: Sends a warning to server console when a player exceeds the max allowed Download Fails.

setting.name: *kick_when_too_many_dl_fails
setting.friendlyname: Kick Players for Exceeding DL Fails
setting.desc: Enable/Disable kicking players when they fail to download a file X times (defined in other setting).

setting.name: *enable_nandocrypt
setting.friendlyname: Enable NandoCrypt File Decryption
setting.desc: Check documentation to understand how it works.

setting.name: *nc_decrypt_function
setting.friendlyname: NandoCrypt Decrypt Function Name
setting.desc: Check documentation to understand how it works.

setting.name: *cmd_panel
setting.friendlyname: Command Name to open the Mod Downloader GUI
setting.desc: Optional: leave empty "" for no command

setting.name: *bind_panel
setting.friendlyname: Valid Key Bind Name to open the Mod Downloader GUI
setting.desc: Optional: leave empty "" for no bind

setting.name: *allow_refresh_mods
setting.friendlyname: Show a 'Refresh' button in the GUI
setting.desc: Used to re-apply/reload all mods on the client

setting.name: *anti_spam_delay_load_mods
setting.friendlyname: Waiting Time between Mod Reloads for Player

setting.name: *anti_spam_delay_gui_buttons
setting.friendlyname: Waiting Time between GUI Button Clicks

setting.name: *color_msg
setting.friendlyname: Message (after prefix) color

setting.name: *color_info
setting.friendlyname: Information prefix color

setting.name: *color_success
setting.friendlyname: Success prefix color

setting.name: *color_error
setting.friendlyname: Error prefix color

setting.name: *color_warning
setting.friendlyname: Warning prefix color

setting.name: *msg_prefix
setting.friendlyname: Message Prefix

setting.name: *msg_no_access
setting.value: You cannot use the Mod Downloader panel now.
setting.friendlyname: Message for lacking permission to open Mod Downloader GUI

setting.name: *msg_too_fast
setting.value: Please wait before doing this again..
setting.friendlyname: Message for doing something too fast

setting.name: *msg_mod_download
setting.value: You will now download then activate the mod:
setting.friendlyname: Message for informing of initiated mod download

setting.name: *msg_mod_activated
setting.friendlyname: Message for informing of mod activation

setting.name: *msg_mod_activated_all
setting.friendlyname: Message for informing of mod activation (multiple)

setting.name: *msg_mod_deactivated
setting.friendlyname: Message for informing of mod deactivation

setting.name: *msg_mod_deactivated_all
setting.friendlyname: Message for informing of mod deactivation (multiple)

setting.name: *gui_title
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Mod Downloader Panel title

setting.name: *gui_description
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Mod Downloader Panel description (40px height, centered)

setting.name: *gui_btn_enable
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Enable a mod

setting.name: *gui_btn_disable
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Disable a mod

setting.name: *gui_btn_enableall
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Enable all mods available

setting.name: *gui_btn_disableall
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Disable all mods available

setting.name: *gui_btn_close
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Mod Downloader close text

setting.name: *gui_btn_refresh
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Refresh/Re-apply all available mods

setting.name: *gui_grid_col_name
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Mod name column

setting.name: *gui_grid_col_replaces
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Mod replaces column

setting.name: *gui_grid_col_enabled
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Mod enabled column

setting.name: *gui_grid_col_ready
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Mod ready column

setting.name: *gui_yes
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: Yes

setting.name: *gui_no
setting.friendlyname: GUI text: No
